title: Problem-Based Science Simulation Design in 3D Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Fundamental Science Theory and Practical Experience, with Preference for VR Device Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Learning group composed of professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, using personal VR devices via BYOD

learning_goals: They can analyze real-world scientific problems in 3D virtual environments and derive solutions following design principles
Collaborative tools can be used to develop and simulate problem-solving scenarios within a 3D space with team members
VR-based project outcomes can be self- and peer-evaluated according to assessment criteria and improved
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
